trans-unit.source: How to Use Twilio for Voice and SMS (PHP) | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: How to Use Twilio for Voice and SMS (PHP) | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to make a phone call and send a SMS message with the Twilio API service on Azure. Code samples written in PHP.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to make a phone call and send a SMS message with the Twilio API service on Azure. Code samples written in PHP.

trans-unit.source: This guide demonstrates how to perform common programming tasks with the Twilio API service on Azure.
trans-unit.target: This guide demonstrates how to perform common programming tasks with the Twilio API service on Azure.

trans-unit.source: The scenarios covered include making a phone call and sending a Short Message Service (SMS) message.
trans-unit.target: The scenarios covered include making a phone call and sending a Short Message Service (SMS) message.

trans-unit.source: For more information on Twilio and using voice and SMS in your applications, see the <linkText>Next Steps</linkText><title></title> section.
trans-unit.target: For more information on Twilio and using voice and SMS in your applications, see the <linkText>Next Steps</linkText><title></title> section.

trans-unit.source: Twilio is powering the future of business communications, enabling developers to embed voice, VoIP, and messaging into applications.
trans-unit.target: Twilio is powering the future of business communications, enabling developers to embed voice, VoIP, and messaging into applications.

trans-unit.source: They virtualize all infrastructure needed in a cloud-based, global environment, exposing it through the Twilio communications API platform.
trans-unit.target: They virtualize all infrastructure needed in a cloud-based, global environment, exposing it through the Twilio communications API platform.

trans-unit.source: Applications are simple to build and scalable.
trans-unit.target: Applications are simple to build and scalable.

trans-unit.source: Enjoy flexibility with pay-as-you go pricing, and benefit from cloud reliability.
trans-unit.target: Enjoy flexibility with pay-as-you go pricing, and benefit from cloud reliability.

trans-unit.source: Twilio Voice allows your applications to make and receive phone calls.
trans-unit.target: Twilio Voice allows your applications to make and receive phone calls.

trans-unit.source: Twilio SMS enables your application to send and receive text messages.
trans-unit.target: Twilio SMS enables your application to send and receive text messages.

trans-unit.source: Twilio Client allows you to make VoIP calls from any phone, tablet, or browser and supports WebRTC.
trans-unit.target: Twilio Client allows you to make VoIP calls from any phone, tablet, or browser and supports WebRTC.

trans-unit.source: Azure customers receive a <linkText>special offer</linkText><title></title>: complimentary $10 of Twilio Credit when you upgrade your Twilio Account.
trans-unit.target: Azure customers receive a <linkText>special offer</linkText><title></title>: complimentary $10 of Twilio Credit when you upgrade your Twilio Account.

trans-unit.source: This Twilio Credit can be applied to any Twilio usage ($10 credit equivalent to sending as many as 1,000 SMS messages or receiving up to 1000 inbound Voice minutes, depending on the location of your phone number and message or call destination).
trans-unit.target: This Twilio Credit can be applied to any Twilio usage ($10 credit equivalent to sending as many as 1,000 SMS messages or receiving up to 1000 inbound Voice minutes, depending on the location of your phone number and message or call destination).

trans-unit.source: Redeem this Twilio credit and get started at: <linkText>http://ahoy.twilio.com/azure</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Redeem this Twilio credit and get started at: <linkText>http://ahoy.twilio.com/azure</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Twilio is a pay-as-you-go service.
trans-unit.target: Twilio is a pay-as-you-go service.

trans-unit.source: There are no set-up fees and you can close your account at any time.
trans-unit.target: There are no set-up fees and you can close your account at any time.

trans-unit.source: You can find more details at <linkText>Twilio Pricing[twilio_pricing]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: You can find more details at <linkText>Twilio Pricing[twilio_pricing]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The Twilio API is a RESTful API that provides voice and SMS functionality for applications.
trans-unit.target: The Twilio API is a RESTful API that provides voice and SMS functionality for applications.

trans-unit.source: Client libraries are available in multiple languages; for a list, see <linkText>Twilio API Libraries[twilio_libraries]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Client libraries are available in multiple languages; for a list, see <linkText>Twilio API Libraries[twilio_libraries]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Key aspects of the Twilio API are Twilio verbs and Twilio Markup Language (TwiML).
trans-unit.target: Key aspects of the Twilio API are Twilio verbs and Twilio Markup Language (TwiML).

trans-unit.source: The API makes use of Twilio verbs; for example, the <Say> verb instructs Twilio to audibly deliver a message on a call.
trans-unit.target: The API makes use of Twilio verbs; for example, the <Say> verb instructs Twilio to audibly deliver a message on a call.

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of Twilio verbs.
trans-unit.target: The following is a list of Twilio verbs.

trans-unit.source: Learn about the other verbs and capabilities via <linkText>Twilio Markup Language documentation</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Learn about the other verbs and capabilities via <linkText>Twilio Markup Language documentation</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: <Dial>: Connects the caller to another phone.
trans-unit.target: <Dial>: Connects the caller to another phone.

trans-unit.source: <Gather>: Collects numeric digits entered on the telephone keypad.
trans-unit.target: <Gather>: Collects numeric digits entered on the telephone keypad.

trans-unit.source: <Hangup>: Ends a call.
trans-unit.target: <Hangup>: Ends a call.

trans-unit.source: <Play>: Plays an audio file.
trans-unit.target: <Play>: Plays an audio file.

trans-unit.source: <Pause>: Waits silently for a specified number of seconds.
trans-unit.target: <Pause>: Waits silently for a specified number of seconds.

trans-unit.source: <Record>: Records the caller's voice and returns a URL of a file that contains the recording.
trans-unit.target: <Record>: Records the caller's voice and returns a URL of a file that contains the recording.

trans-unit.source: <Redirect>: Transfers control of a call or SMS to the TwiML at a different URL.
trans-unit.target: <Redirect>: Transfers control of a call or SMS to the TwiML at a different URL.

trans-unit.source: <Reject>: Rejects an incoming call to your Twilio number without billing you
trans-unit.target: <Reject>: Rejects an incoming call to your Twilio number without billing you

trans-unit.source: <Say>: Converts text to speech that is made on a call.
trans-unit.target: <Say>: Converts text to speech that is made on a call.

trans-unit.source: <Sms>: Sends an SMS message.
trans-unit.target: <Sms>: Sends an SMS message.

trans-unit.source: TwiML is a set of XML-based instructions based on the Twilio verbs that inform Twilio of how to process a call or SMS.
trans-unit.target: TwiML is a set of XML-based instructions based on the Twilio verbs that inform Twilio of how to process a call or SMS.

trans-unit.source: As an example, the following TwiML would convert the text Hello World to speech.
trans-unit.target: As an example, the following TwiML would convert the text Hello World to speech.

trans-unit.source: When your application calls the Twilio API, one of the API parameters is the URL that returns the TwiML response.
trans-unit.target: When your application calls the Twilio API, one of the API parameters is the URL that returns the TwiML response.

trans-unit.source: For development purposes, you can use Twilio-provided URLs to provide the TwiML responses used by your applications.
trans-unit.target: For development purposes, you can use Twilio-provided URLs to provide the TwiML responses used by your applications.

trans-unit.source: You could also host your own URLs to produce the TwiML responses, and another option is to use the TwiMLResponse object.
trans-unit.target: You could also host your own URLs to produce the TwiML responses, and another option is to use the TwiMLResponse object.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Twilio verbs, their attributes, and TwiML, see <linkText>TwiML[twiml]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about Twilio verbs, their attributes, and TwiML, see <linkText>TwiML[twiml]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: For additional information about the Twilio API, see <linkText>Twilio API[twilio_api]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For additional information about the Twilio API, see <linkText>Twilio API[twilio_api]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: When you're ready to get a Twilio account, sign up at <linkText>Try Twilio[try_twilio]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: When you're ready to get a Twilio account, sign up at <linkText>Try Twilio[try_twilio]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: You can start with a free account, and upgrade your account later.
trans-unit.target: You can start with a free account, and upgrade your account later.

trans-unit.source: When you sign up for a Twilio account, you'll receive an account ID and an authentication token.
trans-unit.target: When you sign up for a Twilio account, you'll receive an account ID and an authentication token.

trans-unit.source: Both will be needed to make Twilio API calls.
trans-unit.target: Both will be needed to make Twilio API calls.

trans-unit.source: To prevent unauthorized access to your account, keep your authentication token secure.
trans-unit.target: To prevent unauthorized access to your account, keep your authentication token secure.

trans-unit.source: Your account ID and authentication token are viewable at the Twilio account page[twilio_account], in the fields labeled ACCOUNT SID and AUTH TOKEN, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Your account ID and authentication token are viewable at the Twilio account page[twilio_account], in the fields labeled ACCOUNT SID and AUTH TOKEN, respectively.

trans-unit.source: A PHP application that uses the Twilio service and is running in Azure is no different than any other PHP application that uses the Twilio service.
trans-unit.target: A PHP application that uses the Twilio service and is running in Azure is no different than any other PHP application that uses the Twilio service.

trans-unit.source: While Twilio services are REST-based and can be called from PHP in several ways, this article will focus on how to use Twilio services with <linkText>Twilio library for PHP from GitHub[twilio_php]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: While Twilio services are REST-based and can be called from PHP in several ways, this article will focus on how to use Twilio services with <linkText>Twilio library for PHP from GitHub[twilio_php]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the Twilio library for PHP, see <linkText>http://readthedocs.org/docs/twilio-php/en/latest/index.html[twilio_lib_docs]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about using the Twilio library for PHP, see <linkText>http://readthedocs.org/docs/twilio-php/en/latest/index.html[twilio_lib_docs]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Detailed instructions for building and deploying a Twilio/PHP application to Azure are available at <linkText>How to Make a Phone Call Using Twilio in a PHP Application on Azure[howto_phonecall_php]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Detailed instructions for building and deploying a Twilio/PHP application to Azure are available at <linkText>How to Make a Phone Call Using Twilio in a PHP Application on Azure[howto_phonecall_php]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: You can configure your application to use the Twilio library for PHP in two ways:
trans-unit.target: You can configure your application to use the Twilio library for PHP in two ways:

trans-unit.source: Download the Twilio library for PHP from GitHub (https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php[twilio_php]) and add the Services directory to your application.
trans-unit.target: Download the Twilio library for PHP from GitHub (https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php[twilio_php]) and add the Services directory to your application.

trans-unit.source: -OR-
trans-unit.target: -OR-

trans-unit.source: Install the Twilio library for PHP as a PEAR package.
trans-unit.target: Install the Twilio library for PHP as a PEAR package.

trans-unit.source: It can be installed with the following commands:
trans-unit.target: It can be installed with the following commands:

trans-unit.source: Once you have installed the Twilio library for PHP, you can then add a require_once statement at the top of your PHP files to reference the library:
trans-unit.target: Once you have installed the Twilio library for PHP, you can then add a require_once statement at the top of your PHP files to reference the library:

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <linkText>https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php/blob/master/README.md[twilio_github_readme]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <linkText>https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php/blob/master/README.md[twilio_github_readme]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The following shows how to make an outgoing call using the Services_Twilio class.
trans-unit.target: The following shows how to make an outgoing call using the Services_Twilio class.

trans-unit.source: This code also uses a Twilio-provided site to return the Twilio Markup Language (TwiML) response.
trans-unit.target: This code also uses a Twilio-provided site to return the Twilio Markup Language (TwiML) response.

trans-unit.source: Substitute your values for the From and To phone numbers, and ensure that you verify the From phone number for your Twilio account prior to running the code.
trans-unit.target: Substitute your values for the From and To phone numbers, and ensure that you verify the From phone number for your Twilio account prior to running the code.

trans-unit.source: As mentioned, this code uses a Twilio-provided site to return the TwiML response.
trans-unit.target: As mentioned, this code uses a Twilio-provided site to return the TwiML response.

trans-unit.source: You could instead use your own site to provide the TwiML response; for more information, see [How to Provide TwiML Responses from Your Own Web Site](#howtoprovidetwiml_responses).
trans-unit.target: You could instead use your own site to provide the TwiML response; for more information, see [How to Provide TwiML Responses from Your Own Web Site](#howtoprovidetwiml_responses).

trans-unit.source: Note: To troubleshoot SSL certificate validation errors, see http://readthedocs.org/docs/twilio-php/en/latest/usage/rest.html[ssl_validation]
trans-unit.target: Note: To troubleshoot SSL certificate validation errors, see http://readthedocs.org/docs/twilio-php/en/latest/usage/rest.html[ssl_validation]

trans-unit.source: The following shows how to send an SMS message using the Services_Twilio class.
trans-unit.target: The following shows how to send an SMS message using the Services_Twilio class.

trans-unit.source: The From number is provided by Twilio for trial accounts to send SMS messages.
trans-unit.target: The From number is provided by Twilio for trial accounts to send SMS messages.

trans-unit.source: The To number must be verified for your Twilio account prior to running the code.
trans-unit.target: The To number must be verified for your Twilio account prior to running the code.

trans-unit.source: When your application initiates a call to the Twilio API, Twilio will send your request to a URL that is expected to return a TwiML response. The example above uses the Twilio-provided URL http://twimlets.com/message[twimlet_message_url]. (While TwiML is designed for use by Twilio, you can view the it in your browser. For example, click http://twimlets.com/message[twimlet_message_url] to see an empty element; as another example, click http://twimlets.com/message?Message%5B0%5D=Hello%20World[twimlet_message_url_hello_world] to see a element that contains a element.)
trans-unit.target: When your application initiates a call to the Twilio API, Twilio will send your request to a URL that is expected to return a TwiML response. The example above uses the Twilio-provided URL http://twimlets.com/message[twimlet_message_url]. (While TwiML is designed for use by Twilio, you can view the it in your browser. For example, click http://twimlets.com/message[twimlet_message_url] to see an empty element; as another example, click http://twimlets.com/message?Message%5B0%5D=Hello%20World[twimlet_message_url_hello_world] to see a element that contains a element.)

trans-unit.source: Instead of relying on the Twilio-provided URL, you can create your own site that returns HTTP responses.
trans-unit.target: Instead of relying on the Twilio-provided URL, you can create your own site that returns HTTP responses.

trans-unit.source: You can create the site in any language that returns XML responses; this topic assumes you'll be using PHP to create the TwiML.
trans-unit.target: You can create the site in any language that returns XML responses; this topic assumes you'll be using PHP to create the TwiML.

trans-unit.source: The following PHP page results in a TwiML response that says Hello World on the call.
trans-unit.target: The following PHP page results in a TwiML response that says Hello World on the call.

trans-unit.source: As you can see from the example above, the TwiML response is simply an XML document.
trans-unit.target: As you can see from the example above, the TwiML response is simply an XML document.

trans-unit.source: The Twilio library for PHP contains classes that will generate TwiML for you.
trans-unit.target: The Twilio library for PHP contains classes that will generate TwiML for you.

trans-unit.source: The example below produces the equivalent response as shown above, but uses the Services\_Twilio\_Twiml class in the Twilio library for PHP:
trans-unit.target: The example below produces the equivalent response as shown above, but uses the Services\_Twilio\_Twiml class in the Twilio library for PHP:

trans-unit.source: For more information about TwiML, see <linkText>https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml[twiml_reference]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about TwiML, see <linkText>https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml[twiml_reference]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Once you have your PHP page set up to provide TwiML responses, use the URL of the PHP page as the URL passed into the Services_Twilio->account->calls->create method.
trans-unit.target: Once you have your PHP page set up to provide TwiML responses, use the URL of the PHP page as the URL passed into the Services_Twilio->account->calls->create method.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a Web application named MyTwiML deployed to an Azure hosted service, and the name of the PHP page is mytwiml.php, the URL can be passed to Services_Twilio->account->calls->create as shown in the following example:
trans-unit.target: For example, if you have a Web application named MyTwiML deployed to an Azure hosted service, and the name of the PHP page is mytwiml.php, the URL can be passed to Services_Twilio->account->calls->create as shown in the following example:

trans-unit.source: For additional information about using Twilio in Azure with PHP, see <linkText>How to Make a Phone Call Using Twilio in a PHP Application on Azure[howto_phonecall_php]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For additional information about using Twilio in Azure with PHP, see <linkText>How to Make a Phone Call Using Twilio in a PHP Application on Azure[howto_phonecall_php]</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the examples shown here, Twilio offers web-based APIs that you can use to leverage additional Twilio functionality from your Azure application.
trans-unit.target: In addition to the examples shown here, Twilio offers web-based APIs that you can use to leverage additional Twilio functionality from your Azure application.

trans-unit.source: For full details, see the <linkText>Twilio API documentation[twilio_api_documentation]</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For full details, see the <linkText>Twilio API documentation[twilio_api_documentation]</linkText><title></title>.
